title: X3 Terran Conflict 3.2c and Albion Prelude 3.0
description:
X3 Terran Conflict 3.2c and Albion Prelude 3.0 repack with Hungarian translate, but English and Russian Speech included too.

Install:

1. Extract
2. Install DirectX and vc_redist from Tools folder
3. Run HUN_Translate_Uninstall.bat if you don't speak this language


Change to russian language:

0. Run HUN_Translate_Uninstall.bat
1. Open Lang.dat file with a text editor (notepad)
2. Change the number (44) to 7
3. Do the same with addonlang.dat file 


Change to english language:

1. Run HUN_Translate_Uninstall.bat and done
